titleStmt.title: The fountain opened, or, The great gospel priviledge of having Christ exhibited to sinfull men wherein also is proved that there shall be a national calling of the Jews from Zech. XIII. I. / by Samuel Willard ...
titleStmt.author: Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Green, and J. Allen, for Samuel Sewall Junior,

notesStmt.note: Includes: Evangelical perfection, or, How far the gospel requires believers to aspire after being compleatly perfect, p. 167-208.
Imperfect: stained and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
